articles.title: Ratan Tata is cremated with full state honours in Mumbai - BBC.com
articles.description: Thousands of people paid their last respects to one of India's most respected business leaders.
articles.content:
Thousands paid their last respects to Tata, one of India's most respected business leaders
The funeral has taken place in Mumbai of Ratan Tata, the former chairman of one of Indias biggest conglomer… [+3213 chars]
